Reference

core functions

functions around which no way leads!

generate()

Generate (neutral) spatial patterns

obtain()

Obtain spatial datasets

modify()

Modify gridded objects

measure()

Measure gridded objects

visualise

function to visualise rasters in rasterTools

visualise()

Visualise raster and geom objects

setTheme()

Create a new theme

rtTheme-class

Theme class (S4) and methods

locate()

Locate (and identify) clicks

document

take care of your duties

reference()

List of references

spatial pattern models

operators to generate spatial patterns (neutral landscape models, etc)

spmRandom()

Generate a neutral random pattern

spmGradient()

Generate a (neutral) gradient pattern

spmHeightmap()

Generate a heightmap

datasets

operators to obtain raster objects from spatial datasets

oGFC() downloadGFC()

Obtain Global Forest Change data

oMODIS() downloadMODIS()

Obtain MODIS data

oWCLIM() downloadWCLIM()

Obtain global climate data

oESALC() downloadESALC()

Obtain global ESA CCI land-cover data

oCLC()

Obtain Corine Land Cover data

oEMMA() downloadEMMA()

Obtain data from the Atlas of European Mammals.

oEFTA() downloadEFTA()

Obtain data from the European Atlas of Forest Tree Species

modifications

operators to modify raster objects

rBinarise()

Binarise the values in a raster

rBlend()

Blend two rasters with each other

rBounded()

Select cells with values between an upper and lower threshold in a raster

rCategorise()

Assign categories to the values in a raster

rCentroid()

Determine the centroid of patches in a raster

rDilate()

Morphologically dilate foreground patches in a raster

rDistance()

Calculate the distance map for a raster

rErode()

Morphologically erode foreground patches in a raster

rFillNA()

Fill NA values in a raster

rGreater()

Select cells with values above a threshold in a raster

rLess()

Select cells with values below a threshold in a raster

rMask()

Select cells of a raster based on a mask

rMatch()

Match cells of a raster with a kernel

rMorph()

Morphologically modify a raster

rOffset()

Offset the values in a raster.

rPatches()

Determine foreground patches in a raster

rPermute()

Apply a permutation to the cell values of a raster

rRange()

Rescale the range of values of a raster

rReduce()

Combine a raster stack after segregation

rRescale()

Change the resolution of a raster

rSegregate()

Segregate values in a raster into layers

rSkeletonise()

Determine the skeleton of foreground patches in a raster

rSubstitute()

Substitute values in a raster

measure

operators to measure raster objects via generic (landscape) metrics

mNumber()

Number of objects

mArea()

Area of objects

mPerimeter()

Edge length

mAdjacency()

Adjacency of cells

mValues()

Cell value distribution

geoms

functions to create and work with objects of class geom

gEditVerts()

Edit the vertices of a geom

gFrom()

Derive a geom from other spatial objects

gGroup()

Group geometries

gRotate()

Rotate geometries

gScale()

Scale geometries

gToGrob()

Transform geometry to grob

gToRaster()

Transform geometry to raster

gToSp()

Transform geometry to spatial object

geom-class

Geometry class (S4) and methods

geomPoint()

Create a point geometry

geomPolygon() geomTriangle() geomSquare() geomRectangle() geomHexagon()

Create a polygon geometry

geomRand()

Create a geometry randomly

geomTiles()

Create a regular tiling geometry

getters and setters

get or set options or objects

getCRS()

Get the coordinate reference system (generic)

getCoords()

Get the table of coordinates (generic)

getExtent()

Get the extent (generic)

getHistory()

Get the history (generic)

getSubset()

Get subset (generic)

getTable()

Get the attribute table (generic)

getWindow()

Get the reference window (generic)

setCRS()

Set (or transform) the coordinate reference system (generic)

setPaths()

Manage the internal paths of rasterTools

setTable()

Set the attribute table (generic)

setTheme()

Create a new theme

setWindow()

Set the reference window (generic)

helpers

other useful functions

catalog()

Build a look-up-table (catalog)

rtPalette()

Create non-linear palettes

example data

data that are used throughout the documentation

rtData

An example raster stack

rtGeoms

Two example Geoms

rtPaths

Dataset paths

rtTheme

Default visualising theme
